fields.label: YouTube of Member
fields.name: youtube_of_member
fields.instructions:
Just put the video code as the example below
e.g.: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XXXXXXXXXXX&t=2s
Just put: XXXXXXXXXXX

fields.label: Address
fields.name: expert_address
fields.instructions: Put Only Text, Put a Number in Field Number.
fields.placeholder: Put Only Text, no Put a Number Here!

fields.label: Have expertise on the following areas:
fields.name: expert_has_expertise

fields.label: CV
fields.name: cv
fields.instructions: Upload your resume and / or qualification certificates. Maximum of 300 MB. Allowed file types: pdf, doc, docx, zip, png, jpg, jpeg
fields.mime_types: pdf, doc, docx, zip, png, jpg, jpeg

choices.I authorize my Pitch to appear on the Ho: I authorize my Pitch to appear on the HomePage of the iDealBiz Experts network website and in the "Meet our Consultants" section

fields.label: Photo
fields.name: foto
fields.instructions: Upload your photo if you want to be listed on our network of consultants. Allowed file types: png, jpg, jpeg or gif

fields.label: iDB Tax (%) Recommended Business
fields.name: rb_idb_tax_recommended_business
fields.instructions: Percentage of Idb Tax(%) Recommended Business

fields.label: Echelon Competency Factor
fields.name: echelon_competency_factor
fields.instructions: Add as many tiers as you think you need.

sub_fields.label: Begin Echelon, example : 0,00
sub_fields.name: begin_echelon
sub_fields.instructions: Do not use "."  "$" use only "," to enter value, example 0,00

sub_fields.label: Finish Echelon, example : 10000,00
sub_fields.name: finish_echelon
sub_fields.instructions: Do not use "."  "$" use only "," to enter value, example 10000,00

sub_fields.label: Percentage,  example : 10 our 10,5
sub_fields.name: percentage
sub_fields.instructions: Place the percentage without "%" symbols and use "," for percentage fraction

fields.label: Force direct contact with advertiser
fields.name: rb_force_direct_contact_with_advertiser
fields.instructions: Marking this field only for the User "Direct Contact to the Advertiser", this will forward the payment email from the Lead to the Advertiser when receiving a Business Opportunity contact.
